About.title: What is Bullish Bears?
About.content:
In a world where the high stakes risk-taking game of stock trading no longer keeps them entertained, a group collectively known as the Bullish Bears set their eyes on a new goal.
Follow them as they discover their new destiny.

Dividends.content:
Dividends are regular payments of profit made to investors.
Dividends can be issued in various forms, such as cash payment, stocks and in our case cryptocurrencies.

2% of the volume generated on OpenSea will be redistributed to holders with a balance of +20 bears.
If you hold more than 20 bears, each additional Bear will increase your share and thus your dividends.

Accumulating +20 bears will guarantee a passive income for decades to come.

If you hold less than 20 bears, well, your bears may be more valuable than you think!
The dividends program will benefit both parties, holders of +20 bears and holders of <20 bears.
Floor bears will become extremely valuable in order to build up a collection of +20 bears.
Dividends will be paid every 14 days to wallets holding more than 20 bears automatically by the smart contract.

Roadmap.content:
The Dividends program will be implemented within 2 days following the launch of collection.
Remember, 2% of the volume generated by OpenSea will be held in a vault in the meantime.

Bears holders will have a chance to claim a mintpass for our next 3d NFT project at 0.06ETH at a ratio of 1 bear = 1 Mintpass.
You have to hold bears in your wallet in order to claim your mintpass!
We'll be doing a community giveaway to win some Ethereum!
We'll be doing a second community giveaway to win some Ethereum!
